description:
Even if creating a server with scheduler_hint: same_host, the server is created on different host on the gate.

'OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host' value of "show a server" API is different between servers like:

 * ubuntu-trusty-2-node-rax-iad-6591881
 * ubuntu-trusty-2-node-rax-iad-6591881-77157

Now we are trying to add Tempest test for verifying the scheduler_hint on https://review.openstack.org/#/c/257660
However the test cannot be passed due to this problem.
title: host names are different even if scheduling servers on the same host

on nova/api/openstack/compute/extended_server_attributes.py, these values are gotten from

 * OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname <- instance.node
 * OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host <- instance['host']

 266     # This is not related to hostname, above.  It refers
 267     #  to the nova node.
 268     host = Column(String(255))  # , ForeignKey('hosts.id'))
 269     # To identify the "ComputeNode" which the instance resides in.
 270     # This equals to ComputeNode.hypervisor_hostname.
 271     node = Column(String(255))
